post.description: Run a single prediction on the model

put.description: Run a single prediction on the model (idempotent creation).

schema.title: Response Cancel Predictions  Prediction Id  Cancel Post

mask.title: Mask
mask.description: Image mask for image inpainting mode. If provided, aspect_ratio, width, and height inputs are ignored.

seed.title: Seed
seed.description: Random seed. Set for reproducible generation

image.title: Image
image.description: Input image for image to image or inpainting mode. If provided, aspect_ratio, width, and height inputs are ignored.

model.description: Which model to run inference with. The dev model performs best with around 28 inference steps but the schnell model only needs 4 steps.

width.title: Width
width.description: Width of generated image. Only works if `aspect_ratio` is set to custom. Will be rounded to nearest multiple of 16. Incompatible with fast generation

height.title: Height
height.description: Height of generated image. Only works if `aspect_ratio` is set to custom. Will be rounded to nearest multiple of 16. Incompatible with fast generation

prompt.title: Prompt
prompt.description: Prompt for generated image. If you include the `trigger_word` used in the training process you are more likely to activate the trained object, style, or concept in the resulting image.

go_fast.title: Go Fast
go_fast.description: Run faster predictions with model optimized for speed (currently fp8 quantized); disable to run in original bf16

extra_lora.title: Extra Lora
extra_lora.description: Load LoRA weights. Supports Replicate models in the format <owner>/<username> or <owner>/<username>/<version>, HuggingFace URLs in the format huggingface.co/<owner>/<model-name>, CivitAI URLs in the format civitai.com/models/<id>[/<model-name>], or arbitrary .safetensors URLs from the Internet. For example, 'fofr/flux-pixar-cars'

lora_scale.title: Lora Scale
lora_scale.description: Determines how strongly the main LoRA should be applied. Sane results between 0 and 1 for base inference. For go_fast we apply a 1.5x multiplier to this value; we've generally seen good performance when scaling the base value by that amount. You may still need to experiment to find the best value for your particular lora.

megapixels.description: Approximate number of megapixels for generated image

aspect_ratio.description: Aspect ratio for the generated image. If custom is selected, uses height and width below & will run in bf16 mode

guidance_scale.title: Guidance Scale
guidance_scale.description: Guidance scale for the diffusion process. Lower values can give more realistic images. Good values to try are 2, 2.5, 3 and 3.5

output_quality.title: Output Quality
output_quality.description: Quality when saving the output images, from 0 to 100. 100 is best quality, 0 is lowest quality. Not relevant for .png outputs

prompt_strength.title: Prompt Strength
prompt_strength.description: Prompt strength when using img2img. 1.0 corresponds to full destruction of information in image

extra_lora_scale.title: Extra Lora Scale
extra_lora_scale.description: Determines how strongly the extra LoRA should be applied. Sane results between 0 and 1 for base inference. For go_fast we apply a 1.5x multiplier to this value; we've generally seen good performance when scaling the base value by that amount. You may still need to experiment to find the best value for your particular lora.

replicate_weights.title: Replicate Weights
replicate_weights.description: Load LoRA weights. Supports Replicate models in the format <owner>/<username> or <owner>/<username>/<version>, HuggingFace URLs in the format huggingface.co/<owner>/<model-name>, CivitAI URLs in the format civitai.com/models/<id>[/<model-name>], or arbitrary .safetensors URLs from the Internet. For example, 'fofr/flux-pixar-cars'

num_inference_steps.title: Num Inference Steps
num_inference_steps.description: Number of denoising steps. More steps can give more detailed images, but take longer.

disable_safety_checker.title: Disable Safety Checker
disable_safety_checker.description: Disable safety checker for generated images.
